situation.title: How to make a face mask
situation.meta_description: You can make your own DIY face mask.

content.processed:
Recommendations and Regulations

You can make your own DIY reusable textile face mask.

To make a reusable face mask, we recommend using cotton textiles. Cotton textiles are washable in high temperatures without damaging the textile. It is necessary to wash your face mask at high temperature to disinfect it.
